alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Centre; Clinton; Columbia; Fulton; Huntingdon; Juniata (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 04 at 12:34AM EST until February 05 at 10:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Bedford, Blair, Centre, Clinton, Columbia, Fulton, Huntingdon, Juniata, Lycoming, Mifflin, Montour, Northumberland, Snyder, Somerset and Union. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated. Ice movement may lead to jams and blockages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1233 AM EST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Altoona, State College, Williamsport, Bloomsburg, Berwick, Sunbury, Lock Haven, Lewistown, Shamokin, Huntingdon, Milton, Somerset, Bellefonte, Lewisburg, Hollidaysburg, Selinsgrove, Tyrone, Danville, Montoursville and Jersey Shore. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Blair; Centre; Clinton; Columbia; Fulton; Huntingdon; Juniata
